Literature.Title: Novel short antibacterial and antifungal peptides with low cytotoxicity: Efficacy and action mechanisms.
Literature.Author: Qi X, Zhou C, Li P, Xu W, Cao Y, Ling H, Ning Chen W, Ming Li C, Xu R, Lamrani M, Mu Y, Leong SS, Wook Chang M, Chan-Park MB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=50µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Fusarium solani ATCC 36031(MIC=12.5µg/ml)
